text: "The Landlady" is a short story by Roald Dahl. It was first published in a magazine called The New Yorker, in 1959. It was also included in a collection of short stories, called Kiss Kiss, published in 1960. It won the Edgar Awards in 1960, in the category "Best Short Story Mystery" in 1960. Category:1959 works Category:20th-century American short stories
title: The Landlady (short story)
